## GA algorithm
This is an R package that uses genetic algorithms for function parameter optimzation <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/GA/index.html>.

```{r loadlibs}
library("testthat")
library("GA")
library("genalg")
```

## Visualize data?

You can also embed plots, for example:

#plot(pressure)
